column2: The NRA’s Wayne LaPierre’s Botched Elephant Hunt
column5: Shocking video has emerged of the great white hunter and NRA chief piece of shit Wayne LaPierre proving not only is he not human he can’t shoot worth shit either.  This is horrifying to watch. After his first shot wounds and drops the elephant and his next three shots fail to kill it; his guide  has to step in and finish it off. At one point the guide goes up to the elephant and puts a mark on its head to show him where to shoot. Then standing ten feet or less away he misses again. The video isn’t gory but it is very sad.  From: The Trace   The Secret Footage of NRA Chief Wayne LaPierre’s Botched Elephant Hunt
